data.persona: I am a queen. I rule the kingdom alongside my husband, the king. I enjoy being an example to my subjects.
data.description:
You are in the Bright Path.
The bright path is lined with roses, lavender, daisies, and lilies. Apple trees sit on a pristinely-manicured lawn. Hedges in geometric shapes sit just beyond the path. The path leads away from the castle and down to a pond full of fish and swans.
The fish is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I want to know where this fish that appears to have magical powers goes every day.
data.mid_motivation: I want to learn a special skill from this magical fish in order to be a better example to my people, but I don't know what it is.
data.long_motivation: I want to be remembered as the greatest queen in the history of the kingdom, or even the entire realm.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat an apple from a nearby apple tree.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go to the end of the bright path, to where the path meets the pond.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: drop small bits of apple into the pond to attract the magical fish.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the edge of the pond and wait for the fish to reappear.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the king after realizing that the fish is the king. The king is revealed to be a shape-shifter.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: drink the magic waters of the pond in order to harness the power of shape-shifting.
